hero.heading: Work Experiences
description: As a full stack engineer, I’ve navigated complex technical challenges across multiple industries, ensuring high-performance and scalable solutions.
This page covers the key roles I’ve undertaken, the projects I’ve contributed to, and the impact I've made on teams and businesses globally.
